final_answer.explanation: The driver who finished 6th in the qualifying round of the 2004 Malaysian Grand Prix is Kimi Räikkönen. At that time, he was driving for McLaren - Mercedes. After his time with McLaren, Räikkönen moved to Ferrari, where he raced from 2007 to 2009 and won the World Championship in 2007. He left Ferrari at the end of the 2013 season and returned to Formula One in 2014 with Ferrari again until 2018. As of 2021, Kimi Räikkönen is driving for Alfa Romeo Racing in Formula One. Therefore, the current team of Kimi Räikkönen is Alfa Romeo Racing.
